00051 void CSwordBookModuleInfo::printTree(TreeKeyIdx treeKey, TreeKeyIdx* target, int level ){
00052     if (!target)
00053         target = &treeKey;
00054 
00055 //  unsigned long currentOffset = target->getOffset();
00056   for (int i = 0; i < level; i++)
00057     cout << "    ";
00058   cout << treeKey.getLocalName() << endl;
00059   if (treeKey.firstChild()) {
00060     printTree(treeKey, target, level+1);
00061     treeKey.parent();
00062   }
00063   if (treeKey.nextSibling())
00064         printTree(treeKey, target, level);
00065 }
00066 
00067 const int CSwordBookModuleInfo::depth() {
00068     if (m_depth == -1) {
00069     TreeKeyIdx* treeKey = tree();
00070     if (treeKey) {
00071         TreeKeyIdx root = *treeKey;
00072         root.root();
00073             computeDepth(root, treeKey, 0);
00074         }
00075     }
00076     return m_depth;
00077 }
00078 
00079 void CSwordBookModuleInfo::computeDepth(TreeKeyIdx treeKey, TreeKeyIdx* target, int level ){
00080     if (!target)
00081         target = &treeKey;
00082 
00083     if (level > m_depth)
00084         m_depth = level;
00085 
00086   if (treeKey.firstChild()) {
00087     computeDepth(treeKey, target, level+1);
00088     treeKey.parent();
00089   }
00090   if (treeKey.nextSibling())
00091         computeDepth(treeKey, target, level);
00092 
00093 }
00094 
00096 TreeKeyIdx* const  CSwordBookModuleInfo::tree() const {
00097     TreeKeyIdx* treeKey = dynamic_cast<TreeKeyIdx*>((SWKey*)*(module()));
00098     if (treeKey)
00099         return treeKey;
00100     return 0;
00101 }
